attributes.action: Ban Junk Food advertising and Promotion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been demonstrated that Junk Food which is high in fats and/or sugar though often tasty forms far too high a factor in our national diet.  In order to encourage healthy eating whilst this food should not be illegal it should be unlawful to actively promote its consumption.  Therefore all advertising of junk food should cease together with promotions especially those aimed at children such as "Happy Meals" and "Free" cheap toys.  Obesity is after all just as big a killer as smoking.  Anything that can be done reduce it has to be good for society.
